detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave containing some linen with elastication and smocking around the top and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at the top, front and back.

Short, hooded parka in a pima cotton weave with a drawstring at the top, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long wide sleeves, a patch front pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Top in patterned mesh. Short puff sleeves with smocked trims.

Lightly padded cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft velour. Cardigan with a hood, wrapover front with concealed press-studs and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Jersey lining.. Trousers with wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the cardigan and trousers is organic.
Long-sleeved top in supersoft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed finish. Deep V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
A-line dress in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a smocked stand-up collar, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocked cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Fitted top in sturdy, stretch microfibre with narrow shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a sequin-embroidered motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scrunchies in a soft, patterned weave.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in a fine-knit silk and cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains with bead, coin and plastic stone pendants. Adjustable length 25-28 cm.
Cotton trousers in a textured knit with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Shirt in cotton twill with a button-down collar with concealed buttons, a classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.

Set with a dungaree dress and short-sleeved top. Dress in soft washed denim with embroidery on the front, adjustable straps with press-studs and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist. Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Three-strand metal necklace decorated with shell-shaped beads in metal and pearly plastic. Adjustable length 32-40 cm.
Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders, short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Short dress in woven fabric with a wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with decorative metal studs, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Body in jersey with a wrapover top, deep V-neck and draping. Gathered seam at the shoulders and waist, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck top in soft jersey with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Body in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back, tie-top shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a bow at the front, a grosgrain trim around the top and an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Long, sleeveless dress in patterned satin with a gathered, elasticated neckline, short, double shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Jacket in soft, stretch denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Fake front pockets with decorative flaps and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Pool shoes in lightly padded imitation leather with a print motif. Moulded insoles and fluted soles. Sizes 7-9 also have a heel strap.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.
Jazz trousers in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a decorative knot at the front.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Baby Exclusive. Collar in a soft, double weave made from organic cotton. The collar is in the shape of a flounce and has an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an overlocked flounce at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Leggings in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist,an imitation suede patch on the lower legs and ribbed hems.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned and one with a flounce over the shoulders. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt in soft cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knee-length dress in an airy linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam and tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, decorative pocket flaps on the legs and ribbed hems.
Underwired bra in microfibre with laser-cut edges, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with inset lace trims, elastication at the top and hem, and short sleeves with a flounced trim.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.

Mittens in water-repellent, functional fabric with grained imitation leather inside. Adjustable hook and loop tab with reflective details and elasticated cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Water bottle in transparent plastic with a print motif. Shimmering metallic snap-on lid and spout and a detachable, adjustable fabric carry strap. Capacity 450 ml.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Blouse with long puff sleeves that have narrow elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking around the forearms. Square neckline with gathers at the front for a gently draped effect over the bust and smocking at the back. Lined at the front.
Round-neck jumper in a sturdy, fine knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Lace racer back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide mesh strap at the back and metal fastener at the front.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boxy-style shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves.
